column5: Got out last week with family to Nanas and Papas house. A few hours of fishing each morning with my old man and perching off the dock with the kids kept everybody happy. Papa bought a new boat that needed to be tested out on the walleye grounds. The bite was pretty good. I prefer to fish weed walleye and I caught them the way I like to catch em. ( jerk baits,bucktails and grubs in the weeds ) Here are a few pics. Enjoy!
Wow looks like fun! That's some amazing fishing.  Thanks for the report!
the markings on the second northern are awesome
very nice
are those waders?
great report!  THose markings on that pike are pretty wild looking!  Thanks for sharing!  Cheers!
Wow! Nice fish!  TDunn
Good stuff! Looks like a lot of fun for the family.
Man your reports & pics are always awesome.  Nice fish!
Awesome report MSP...Beautiful fish and the smiles on the kids' faces are priceless  Thanks for sharing
Those are some great fish msp and those smiling kids are all beauty.

Great report and wonderful to see the kids with smiles on their faces. How do you fish cranks through the weeds? I know that buck tails and grubs/jig heads rip through alright, but how do multi-hooked cranks do? Thanks, Jim
Love it man!  Family is what it is all about!!
Love the pics of your happy crew.

My favorite lure is a jerkbait because it seems to so versitile and it catches everything. However, it can be pretty tough in the thick weeds. I will throw jerkbaits along the edges and around sparse weeds. I always use braided line to help rip the bait out of the weeds. I also find that a jerkbait like a husky jerk or a rogue performs better in the weeds as opposed to a slashbait like the X-rap because it has less of a side to side action. It can be frustrating at times but the rewards can be great. Thanks for all the kind words guys. Hey Riverfisher22...... they are rain bibs
WOW! Some very impressive fish! I take it they were caught way up north? Your dad looks a bit like John Goodman.
Nice 'eyes, beauty northerns and damn those are some big perch. I guess you guys had  a real nice fish fry.
Nice fish and pics!  The kids look like they were having a great time.
lol, I noticed the same thing.  The perch are definately a nice size
High Fives to all parties involved.........
great looking fish.  those gators sure have a nice skin on them!   congrats to all.
